section.interestTooltip: The annual interest is the fee charged upfront when you open a new position to mint Oracle Free Dollar (OFD). This interest is calculated based on the amount you wish to mint and is typically set by the user. The fee is paid for the entire duration of the position, which can be adjusted based on the maturity period you choose (e.g., 6 months, 12 months).
